Sudah Belasan Tahun SDN Kolagana Baubau Diisi 3 Guru Kelas
05 Nov 2019, 16:29 by Wa Ode Nurliyani



Sudah Belasan Tahun SDN Kolagana Baubau Diisi 3 Guru Kelas



Sudah Belasan Tahun SDN Kolagana Baubau Diisi 3 Guru Kelas


KBRN, Baubau : Sekolah Dasar (SD) Negeri Kecil Kolagana yang terletak di  Kelurahan Palabusa Kecamatan Lea Lea Kota Baubau Sulawesi Tenggara (Sultra)  sudah belasan tahun  kekurangan  guru kelas.Sejak tahun 2005 silam sekolah terpencil itu hanya diisi tiga guru kelas untuk enam kelas belajar. Sedangkan jumlah siswanya sekitar 80 pelajar.Akibat ketidak seimbangan jumlah guru dan kelas, kegiatan belajar mengejar (KBM) di sekolah yang berdiri sejak tahun 1986 itu cukup terhambat dan kurang efektif.”Jumlah kelas tidak sesuai dengan jumlah gurunya,  saat ini guru kelas hanya tiga kalau guru agama dua,”Ungkap  Kepala SDN Kecil Kolagana Rasmin.Bahkan dirinya pun harus turun tangan untuk mengajar dua kelas agar tidak terjadi kekosongan guru.Ia menyebutkan, kondisi  tersebut sudah tidak sesuai dengan amanat  perda No 2 tahun 2012,  yang mana dalam satu kelas belajar di sekolah dasar harus ada satu guru .Rasmin mengaku, telah beberapa kali menemui pihak Dinas Pendidikan bahkan pejabat daerah perihal minimnya jumlah guru di sekolahnya, namun hingga kini  permintaan tersebut belum terjawab.“Dinas Pendidikan sudah, BKD pun sudah, kalau secara lisan sama pejabat daerah juga sudah disampaikan,”Jelasnya“Dan memang  di dalam kota juga kurang gurunya, hanya perimbangan muridnya misalnya enam kelas enam guru tapi  muridnya sampai 40 orang diakali seperti itu masuk pagi dan sore,kalau kita ini sedikit sekali kita punya guru jadi sulit”Sambungnya.Minimnya jumlah guru membuat pihak sekolah ketinggalan berbagai hal. Misalnya tidak dapat menghadiri rapat yang diselenggarakan di pusat kota dan kesulitan membuat pelaporan karena wilayah tersebut minimnya akses internet.Atas keadaan tersebut, pihak sekolah terpaksa menyiasatinya dengan  menggabungkan kelas satu dan kelas dua untuk  diajar satu guru, sementara kelas tiga dan empat masing-masing satu guru, sedangkan  kelas lima dan enam secara bergantian dididik kepala sekolah.Dalam pelaksanaan kegiatan belajar pihak sekolah  pun hanya memprioritaskan siswa agar bisa membaca, menulis dan berhitung.Ia berharap pihak pemerintah merespon positif kondisi sekolah dan menambah jumlah guru produktif berusia muda di sekolah tersebut,  agar pembelajaran di sekolah yang jaraknya lebih dari dua puluh kilometer  dari pusat kota itu dapat berjalan efektif dan efisien.

It's been a dozen years at Kolagana Baubau Elementary School filled with 3 class teachers
05 Nov 2019, 16:29 by Wa Ode Nurliyani



It's been a dozen years at Kolagana Baubau Elementary School filled with 3 class teachers



It's been a dozen years at Kolagana Baubau Elementary School filled with 3 class teachers


KBRN, Baubau: Kolagana Small State Elementary School (SD), located in Palabusa Village, Lea Lea District, Baubau City, Southeast Sulawesi (Southeast Sulawesi) has had a shortage of class teachers for a dozen years. Since 2005 this remote school was only filled with three class teachers for six learning classes . While the number of students is around 80 students. As a result of the imbalance in the number of teachers and classes, the pursuit of learning activities (KBM) in schools established since 1986 was quite hampered and less effective. "The number of classes does not match the number of teachers, currently there are only three class teachers. if there are two religious teachers, "said the Head of the Small Elementary School Kolagana Rasmin. Even he had to intervene to teach two classes so that there was no teacher vacancy. He mentioned, the condition was not in accordance with the mandate of perda No. 2 of 2012, which was in one class there must be one teacher studying in primary school. Rasmin admitted, he had met with the Education Office several times and even local officials regarding the minimum number of teachers in his school, but until now the request had not been answered. "The Education Office had, the BKD had, if verbally the same Regional officials have also been delivered, "he explained." And indeed in the city there is also less teachers, only a balance of students for example, six classes, six teachers, but up to 40 tricked students like that, enter in the morning and evening, if we have very little, we have a teacher, so it's difficult, "he said. The minimum number of teachers makes schools miss things. For example, unable to attend a meeting held in the city center and difficulty in reporting because the region lacks internet access. Regarding these conditions, the school is forced to work around this by combining first and second grades for one teacher to teach, while third and fourth grades each have one teachers, while classes five and six are alternately educated by the school principal. In the implementation of learning activities, the school only prioritizes students to be able to read, write and count. He hopes that the government responds positively to school conditions and increases the number of productive young teachers at the school, so that learning in schools more than twenty kilometers from the city center can run effectively and efficiently.
